subject: Re: Using junit to test swing gui
msgSnippet: Alec, Thanks again, this looks awesome. I managed to get a test implemented quickly and can sense a lot of potential in using the Robot class. John
messageBody:
Alec,
Thanks again, this looks awesome. I managed to get a test implemented
quickly and can sense a lot of potential in using the Robot class.

John
